PageInfo.Message:
On the upper-right corner of the screen you will
find
the <COL ffdc78>"Mini Map"</COL>. Here you can
quickly see
your position and the position of enemies.
<COL ffdc78>The green circle at the center is
your current location,
and small circles represent enemies</COL>
Use it to decide who to attack.

You can change the size and zoom of the "Mini Map"
at any time. Change it according to the situation.
"Resizing"
Change Size with [<KC UI_MINIMAP>]+[<KC
UI_MINIMAP_SCALING>]
"Zooming"
Change Zoom with [<KC UI_MINIMAP>]+[<KC
UI_MAP_ZOOM_IN>Ôºè<KC UI_MAP_ZOOM_OUT>]
"Fixing Position"
Fix the Mini Map with [<KC UI_MINIMAP>]+[<KC
UI_MINIMAP_LOCK>]
